Defining URL:https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/CodeSystem/UKCore-ResidentialStatus
Version:1.0.0
Name:UKCoreResidentialStatus
Status:All the concepts defined by the code system are included in the code system resource
Definition:

A CodeSystem that identifies the residential status of a patient.

Publisher:NHS Digital
Copyright:

Copyright © 2019 NHS Digital

Source Resource:XML / JSON

UK Core Residential Status

A CodeSystem that identifies the residential status of a patient.

Copyright Statement: Copyright © 2019 NHS Digital

This code system https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/CodeSystem/UKCore-ResidentialStatus defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
H UK Resident
O Overseas Resident

Published by NHS Digital nhsdigital.fhir.r4.core.prototype# based on FHIR 4.0.1 created 2019-11-25.
